description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Project_HierarchyObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Project_HierarchyObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Project_HierarchyObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Project Hierarchy Reference for Submit Workday Project Hierarchy Web Service Task.

Financials_Business_Process_Parameters.description: When set to "true" or "1", the business process is automatically processed. This means that all approvals will be automatically approved in the system, all reviews and to-do's will be automatically by-passed, and all notifications will be automatically suppressed.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Free form comment regarding the business process.

validation.validation: This Business Process has been configured to disable comment. Please remove the comment or change the setting in the Business Process Policy or tenant setup.

Project_Hierarchy_WWS_Data.description: This information is for outbound purposes only. Workday doesn't process this information for inbound Web Service requests.

Indicates the project hierarchy is inactive.  A project hierarchy may also be inactivated by a parent project hierarchy as indicated by the 'Inactivated By Hierarchy Reference'.  In which case, the current project hierarchy is considered Inactive even though this Boolean returns False.  Changes to an inactive hierarchy are ignored.  Reactivating a project hierarchy can only be done on the hierarchy if it was explicitly marked 'Inactive' or by reactivating the hierarchy that made the current hierarchy inactive.

validation.validation: The parent project hierarchy selected must be in approved status.
validation.description: The parent project hierarchy selected must be in approved status.

validation.validation: A hierarchy structure is defined on this organization. Please delete the hierarchy structure before assigning any superior organization.
validation.description: A hierarchy structure is defined on this organization. Please delete the hierarchy structure before assigning any superior organization.

validation.validation: The current project hierarchy cannot be updated because it is inactive or it is inactivated by another project hierarchy.  (Inactivated by: [inactivated by])
validation.description: The current project hierarchy cannot be updated because it is inactive or it is inactivated by another project hierarchy.

validation.validation: A Resource Plan cannot be reused across multiple Projects or Project Hierarchies. The Resource Plan specified is already assigned to [project or project hierarchy]
validation.description: A Resource Plan cannot be reused across multiple Projects or Project Hierarchies. The Resource Plan specified is already assigned to a project or project hierarchy.

validation.validation: A top-level Hierarchy Structure exists and is enforced for this hierarchy. Please unenforce the top-level Hierarchy Structure first before changing the Organization Subtype for this hierarchy.
validation.description: A top-level Hierarchy Structure exists and is enforced for this hierarchy. Please unenforce the top-level Hierarchy Structure first before changing the Organization Subtype for this hierarchy.

validation.validation: A top-level Hierarchy Structure exists and is enforced for this hierarchy. Please unenforce the top-level Hierarchy Structure first before changing the parent hierarchy.
validation.description: A top-level Hierarchy Structure exists and is enforced for this hierarchy. Please unenforce the top-level Hierarchy Structure first before changing the parent hierarchy.

validation.validation: A top-level hierarchy structure exists and is enforced for this parent hierarchy. Please unenforce the top-level hierarchy structure first before selecting this as a parent hierarchy.
validation.description: A top-level hierarchy structure exists and is enforced for this parent hierarchy. Please unenforce the top-level hierarchy structure first before selecting this as a parent hierarchy.

validation.validation: A Resource Plan cannot be removed from a Project Hierarchy if Resource Plan Lines are in use by Task Resources.
validation.description: A Resource Plan cannot be removed from a Project Hierarchy if Resource Plan Lines are in use by Task Resources.

validation.validation: A Project Hierarchy cannot be moved under a new parent hierarchy if it will change the Resource Plan whose Resource Plan Lines are in use by Task Resources
validation.description: A Project Hierarchy cannot be moved under a new parent hierarchy if it will change the Resource Plan whose Resource Plan Lines are in use by Task Resources

validation.validation: Remove [projects] from the Projects to Include. These projects have associated billable hours (non-canceled) and can't be moved from their current hierarchy.
validation.description: Projects cannot be added to this hierarchy as few Projects to Include have associated billable hours.

validation.validation: Projects cannot be added to this Project Hierarchy as some of them are already a part of another project hierarchy which uses different Resource Plan and Resource Plan Lines are in use by Task Resources(Projects:[projects])
validation.description: Projects cannot be added to this Project Hierarchy as some of them are already a part of another project hierarchy which uses different Resource Plan and Resource Plan Lines.

validation.validation: The Included Projects field must be empty for optional project hierarchies. Remove projects [projects]
validation.description: The Included Projects field must be empty for optional project hierarchies.

validation.validation: The Included Projects in Optional Hierarchy field must be empty for primary project hierarchies. Remove projects [projects]
validation.description: The Optional Projects field must be empty for primary project hierarchies.

validation.validation: Enable as Optional Hierarchy field can only be changed during the review process
validation.description: Enable as Optional Hierarchy field can only be changed during the review process

validation.validation: Parent of Project Hierarchy must be of the same hierarchy type.
validation.description: Parent of Project Hierarchy must be of the same hierarchy type.

validation.validation: You can't move the referenced Project into the current Project Hierarchy because the Project is inactive.
validation.description: You can't move the referenced Project into the current Project Hierarchy because the Project is inactive.
